name: attogram/open-translation-engine
description: The Open Translation Engine (OTE) is a collaborative translation dictionary manager for the open content web. PHP / SQLite / Attogram Framework module

suggest.attogram/attogram-framework: OTE runs as a module within the Attogram Framework
suggest.attogram/attogram-database: OTE requires the Attogram Database module
suggest.attogram/attogram-user: OTE requires the Attogram User module
suggest.attogram/dams: Open Content translation dictionaries from the Dictionary Additions Management System
